headline: POTTERY BARN LAUNCHES COLLABORATION WITH NORMAN ROCKWELL
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, October 15, 2025--Pottery Barn, a portfolio brand of Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE: WSM), the world’s largest digital-first, design-led and sustainable home retailer, announced today, an exclusive home furnishings collaboration with 20th-century American painter and illustrator, Norman Rockwell. Best known for his warm, nostalgic, and often humorous depictions of everyday life in America, Rockwell’s beloved Holiday artwork from the mid-20th century inspired the Pottery Barn design t
